results.title: To require the use of replacement cost value in determining the premium rates for flood insurance coverage under the National Flood Insurance Act, and for other purposes.
results.short_title: To require the use of replacement cost value in determining the premium rates for flood insurance coverage under the National Flood Insurance Act, and for other purposes.
results.latest_major_action: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 156.
results.summary: This bill amends the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 to direct the Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) to incorporate the replacement cost value of a structure insured under the National Flood Insurance Program of 1968 in its consideration of chargeable premium rates. FEMA must conduct a study regarding risk rating redesign utilizing replacement cost and report the findings to Congress.
results.summary_short: This bill amends the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 to direct the Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) to incorporate the replacement cost value of a structure insured under the National Flood Insurance Program of 1968 in its consideration of chargeable premium rates. FEMA must conduct a study regarding risk rating redesign utilizing replacement cost and report the findings to Congress.

actions.description: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 156.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Financial Services. H. Rept. 115-221.
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 34 - 25.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
